objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SiteInventory-Alarm-MIB::sinvStarted SiteInventory-Alarm-MIB::srcServerName s EXAMPLE SiteInventory-Alarm-MIB::domainName s EXAMPLE SiteInventory-Alarm-MIB::eventTime s EXAMPL SiteInventory-Alarm-MIB::eventDate s EXAMPLE SiteInventory-Alarm-MIB::daemonName s EXAMPLE SiteInventory-Alarm-MIB::trapTime i 9999

description: Server which initiated the trap.
variables.name: SiteInventory-Alarm-MIB::srcServerName

description: Site containing a given workstation.
variables.name: SiteInventory-Alarm-MIB::domainName

description: Event time as in 165745 meaning 16:57:45.
variables.name: SiteInventory-Alarm-MIB::eventTime

description: Event date as in 19970317 meaning March 17, 1997.
variables.name: SiteInventory-Alarm-MIB::eventDate

description: Identifies the sending component: SITEINV.
variables.name: SiteInventory-Alarm-MIB::daemonName

description: The number of seconds since midnight of January 1,1970 GMT.
variables.name: SiteInventory-Alarm-MIB::trapTime
